summary: The Guard and Reserve GI Bill Parity Act of 2025 aims to amend Title 38 of the United States Code to expand eligibility for Post-9/11 Educational Assistance benefits. This expansion primarily focuses on members of the National Guard who perform full-time duty, aligning their educational benefits with those of other reserve components and ensuring retroactive applicability to service since September 11, 2001. The bill also specifies how the time limitation for using these educational benefits will be applied.
